name: house-of-pain
description: - [ ] Must be written using Node - [ ] Have AT LEAST two (2) tables in your database - [ ] One (1) of those tables must be a ‘users’ table that stores user information  - [ ] One (1) of those tables must implement full CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functionality - [ ] Must support session validation with JWT - [ ] Must encrypt sensitive material such as passwords - [ ] Must include AT LEAST 6 API endpoints - [x] Must be deployed with Heroku
author: JpC
